alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains; Southwest Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 04 at 1:53PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of western Owyhee and southeastern Malheur Counties through 230 PM MDT/130 PM PDT/... At 152 PM MDT/1252 PM PDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Star Ranch, or 43 miles southeast of Rome, moving west-southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, half inch hail, and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... North Fork Owyhee Campground around 210 PM MDT. Toppin Creek Butte around 130 PM PDT. Pole Creek Breaks and Three Forks River Access around 230 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
